definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

sentences.english: The rest is the content of the site with some light blueish hover effects.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的內容有淡青色的懸浮效果。

sentences.english: The semi-duplex work form was adopted between suspending gap sensor and control…
sentences.chinese: 而懸浮間隙傳感器和控制器間則採用半雙工方式工作。

sentences.english: The current-loop is a key subsystem of the magnetic levitation controller on maglev vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 電流環是磁浮列車懸浮控制器的重要子系統。

sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 採用懸浮交聯法制備沙棘混合粉的微膠囊。

sentences.english: The unusually big suspension allows the woofer to perform big membrane movements.
sentences.chinese: 這種罕有的大懸浮設計使低音能夠執行大膜移動。

sentences.english: The magnetic-levitation train ride from the international airport to the city is the perfect metaphor for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 從國際機場到市區的磁懸浮列車線是上海的最佳名片。

sentences.english: Books hang on metal strips, creating the levitation effect. [link]
sentences.chinese: 書本都懸掛在金屬架子上，創造出一種懸浮的效果。

sentences.english: We may ride the magnetic suspension train to go to the Pudong international airport.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以乘磁懸浮列車去浦東國際機場。

sentences.english: Determination of azadirachtin in suspension concentrates by reversed phase HPLC;
sentences.chinese: 建立了測定氟苯尼考懸浮乳劑含量的高效液相色譜法。

sentences.english: The importance of zinc powder full suspended in the purity process is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了在淨化過程中鋅粉全懸浮的重要性。

sentences.english: Preparation of high- concentration cell suspension is the most important step.
sentences.chinese: 高濃度細胞懸浮液的製備是其生產的關鍵步驟。

sentences.english: That, in turn, is suspended in a transparent oily fluid.
sentences.chinese: 反過來，就是這些白色粒子懸浮在透明油層中。

sentences.english: Production of Arbutin through Biotransformation of Exogenous Hydroquinone by Datura stramonium Cell Suspension Cultures;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究白花曼陀羅細胞懸浮培養合成生物鹼。

sentences.english: The chemical stability of an out - spayed suspension for aquatic feeds was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對水產飼料外噴塗懸浮液化學穩定性進行了研究。

sentences.english: Keller insists that she has already ruled out resuspension .
sentences.chinese: 凱勒則堅持，她已經排除再懸浮的可能性。

sentences.english: At last, two-point decoupling control algorithm of suspension module is presented.
sentences.chinese: 懸浮模塊的雙點解耦控制算法。

definition: to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
to vanish gradually/to disappear/to fade out
